description.profile2: Yashiro acts as a writer, composer and movie director.
description.profile3: As a philosopher, he studied German philosophy at university of Tsukuba and Analytic philosophy at university of Cologne.
description.profile4: He's currently working as a programmer in Tokyo.

philosophy.utilitarianism_des: I seek to produce the greatest happiness of the greatest number based on Utilitarianism.
philosophy.empiricism_sub: Believe the sense and the analysis.
philosophy.empiricism_des: I seek human knowledge from the analysis about human sense, instead of a-priori recognition.
philosophy.atheism_des: I believe only the facts which can be handled quantitatively and testable.
